name: The difficult life of a newborn planet
name_original: The difficult life of a newborn planet
description:
Life is hard when you are an unstable newborn planet!

When a big asteroid menaces to put a end to your short existence, you sometimes have to rely on someone else. Create a pretty and balanced world, prevent natural disasters and help your inhabitants to thrive!

After your planet is born, you have three biomes to choose from. 

Each coming with it's own catastophe!

But worry not, you can click those to try and prevent them.

Watch your "planetfolks" invest your tiles with their villages and cities.

But you're still unstable, and too much changes can cause disastreous results !

✩ Tips and tricks ✩

These little guys are here to help you know :

If your planet is balanced enough for your population to prosper

If your planet is stable enough to support new changes

If you have enough residents to defend yourself against that pesky asteroid!

Concerning the natural catastrophes :

Mountains are immune to tsunami

Forest fire will spread to nearby forests

Villages protect your tile from a disater, but will sadly be destroyed in the process

Volcanos might happen if you build too fast, or if you replace a tile for another.... And you can't stop them!
